mn56:18.8: Note what was it that primed Upāli’s mind to see the Dhamma ([Stream Entry for Laypeople](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o2AWxZnxeYk)).
mn56:27.20: i.e., it can be made to look acceptable superficially.
mn56:29.45: Note the comparison of jhāna with “rising above” or “emerging”, and not with “absorption”, “immersion”, or “going deeper”. [“What The Jhānas Actually Are”](https://www.hillsidehermitage.org/what-the-jhanas-actually-are/).
